metadata.name: Unsigned Binary Loaded From Suspicious Location
metadata.comment: Detects Code Integrity (CI) engine blocking processes from loading unsigned DLLs residing in suspicious locations

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((lower(LOWER(metadata.event_code)) in (11, 12)) AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\perflogs\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\desktop\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\downloads\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\temp\\'))))

output.summary: Detects Code Integrity (CI) engine blocking processes from loading unsigned DLLs residing in suspicious locations
